TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior

summary.span: Aplicado a um serviço WCF (Windows Communication Foundation) para indicar se esse serviço pode ser executado no código de compatibilidade ASP.NET.

span.span: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando aplicado a uma classe de implementação de serviço, esse atributo indica se esse serviço requer ou suporta [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] modo de compatibilidade para ser habilitado para o domínio de aplicativo de hospedagem (AppDomain).When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain). Hospedagem de AppDomains [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços podem ser executados em dois modos diferentes de hospedagem:AppDomains hosting [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services can run in two different hosting modes: - Misto (padrão) de modo de transportes: nesse modo, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços não participam de [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline HTTP.Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline. Isso garante que um [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviço se comporta de forma consistente, independente do transporte e o ambiente de hospedagem.This guarantees that a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport. - [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Modo de compatibilidade: Nesse modo, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços participarem de [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline HTTP de forma semelhante aos serviços ASMX. Compatibility Mode: In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services. [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] recursos como a autorização do arquivo, UrlAuthorization e estado da sessão HTTP são aplicáveis ao [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços em execução nesse modo. features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services running in this mode. O modo de hospedagem é controlado pelo sinalizador de configuração de nível de aplicativo `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`.The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. `` `` `` Este sinalizador é `false` por padrão e, portanto, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] serviços executados no modo misto transportes, a menos que explicitamente consentir o [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] modo de compatibilidade.This flag is `false` by default and thus [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] modo de compatibilidade, consulte [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). Use o propriedade para fazer isso.Use the property to do this. Em tempo de execução, os aplicativos podem detectar se [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] modo de compatibilidade é habilitado, verificando o valor da propriedade estática .At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples Os desenvolvedores de serviço podem garantir que seu serviço é executado apenas no modo de compatibilidade do ASP.NET, definindo o propriedade o para conforme mostrado no exemplo a seguirService developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to as shown in the following example [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode RequirementsMode { System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode value); };

summary.span: Obtém ou define o nível de [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibilidade exigida pelo serviço.

span.span: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.

value.span: O que indica o nível necessário de serviços de compatibilidade do [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].

span.span: The that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use o propriedade para definir o modo de hospedagem no código.Use the property to set the hosting mode in code. Isso também pode ser feito definindo um sinalizador de configuração de nível de aplicativo `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`.This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). Em tempo de execução, os aplicativos podem detectar se [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] modo de compatibilidade é habilitado, verificando o valor da propriedade estática .At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

summary.span: Verifica se o tipo de hospedagem é consistente com os requisitos de compatibilidade do [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].

span.span: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.
